aka: Pray for Peace, Train for War

cast.name: 朱利叶斯·克尔扎斯托夫斯基 Juliusz Chrzastowski

this_title: Chcesz pokoju, szykuj sie do wojny
trans_title: Pray for Peace, Train for War
introduction: A grotesque story taking place in the milieu of paramilitary groups, revealing the absurdities of one's own ideas of masculinity and bravery. Tytus, a young boy on a master of nature takes place in a paramilitary workshop. He is supported by a young girl who survives in the forest, Natalia, influenza to Tytus, but finds himself in technology.
chinese_title: Chcesz pokoju, szykuj sie do wojny
